catch_line: Land Development Counseling – Fee For Second And Subsequent Sessions.
full_text:
LAND DEVELOPMENT COUNSELING – FEE FOR SECOND AND SUBSEQUENT SESSIONS.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 180,191, Eff. 10/23/08.)

	For the second and each subsequent land development counseling session conducted by the City Planning Department and other City personnel in connection with the operation of the One-Stop Permit Center, a fee of $432.00 shall be paid.

2.catch_line: Filing Fees - Division Of Land And Private Street Maps And Appeals.

11.catch_line: Annual Inspection Of Compliance With Far Averaging Covenant.

14.catch_line: Fees For Enforcement Of Housing Covenants.

15.catch_line: Department Of Transportation Traffic Study Review, Condition Clearance And Permit Issuance Fees.

16.catch_line: General Plan Maintenance Surcharge For The Department Of City Planning.
